notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: This work is part of G.A.W.’s Ph.D. thesis research in the laboratories of M.A.S. and Z.A.R. at University of Kashmir, India and of D.P.K. at Université Laval, Canada. G.A.W. collected leaf materials in Kashmir and Quebec, performed laboratory work, and contributed to drafting the manuscript. M.A.S., Z.A.R. and D.P.K. conceived the project and contributed to the writing of the present manuscript. A.R.A. contributed to the collection of leaf samples in Quebec, analyzed data, and contributed to the writing of the present manuscript. H.T. contributed to statistical analysis and writing of the manuscript. Together, the authors revised and corrected the manuscript versions. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
